item.title: TurmoilX - Join the legend
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Thanks for that Adam -.-"

I’ll get spammed again with retards saying;

“OMG?!?! PLEZ OPUN UP HELUX AGEN MENS?!?! :D”

Just for the record, the only reason I left helix to die because I actually got a life and my developer, Jack, more or less tried to take over everything. If you stuck there with us, then you would know this.

If you really are Dark, then I don’t mind you opening up another server, do as you wish. But you can’t use the Helix-world name or saying your using that source, that isn’t yours to use. I realise now that even calling helix old school was retarded, I was loading 525 items and anims, that’s not old school, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: TurmoilX - Join the legend
item.dc:creator: @helixworldturmoilx helixworldturmoilx
item.description:
@helixworldturmoilx wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:5, topic:447723”][quote author=helixworldturmoilx link=topic=550613.msg4036526#msg4036526 date=1341257067]

Zombie Minigame with helldogs lolwut?

Thats the 10th wave, it starts off with zombies then as it goes along hell hounds etc…

And the other dude saying if im starting helix-world. Jack? and who the hek are you? Jack came later on but I was co-owner on helix for at-least 6 months.
The user is Dark. Dan pretty much ditched helix-world and most of the old players were contacting me to restart it. I don’t want to start any issues but It’s just a way to unite old players.
[/quote]
You are fucking retard, seriously.
You were never a co-owner, believe me.

The biggest mistake ever made was letting Jack even touch it.

If you’d care to PM me I’d happily explain who I am, however, I’m not telling everyone here due to people spamming the shit out of me.[/quote]

Fuck? Who the hek are you newfag obviously u joined helix after it went from regret to helix… I was there when it went from regret-scape to helix-world and remained there for quite some time. If you know someone who played helix for a while ask them… If you wanna private chat me do it i’ll prove you wrong.

P.S This is a turmoilx thread not helix, don’t mention helix here again.

Read full topic

Zombie Minigame with helldogs lolwut?

Thats the 10th wave, it starts off with zombies then as it goes along hell hounds etc…

And the other dude saying if im starting helix-world. Jack? and who the hek are you? Jack came later on but I was co-owner on helix for at-least 6 months.
